title: Ancient vestment set

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Ancient vestment set is a members item set of Prayer armour aligned with Zaros. The pieces are only obtainable by completing easy and medium Treasure Trails.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ancient vestment set
A player wearing Ancient vestments

The Ancient vestment set is a members item set of Prayer armour aligned with Zaros. The pieces are only obtainable by completing easy and medium Treasure Trails.

Requirements[edit | edit source]

Equipping the whole set requires 60 Prayer and 40 Magic, however, each piece has its own requirements:

Item Level Level Clue scroll
reward
Ancient robe top 20 N/A Easy
Ancient robe legs 20 N/A Easy
Ancient mitre 40 40 Medium
Ancient cloak 40 N/A Medium
Ancient crozier 60 N/A Medium
Ancient stole 60 N/A Medium

Components[edit | edit source]

Item GE Price
Ancient robe top 76,686
Ancient robe legs 83,149
Ancient mitre 30,099
Ancient cloak 10,607
Ancient crozier 8,975
Ancient stole 2,740
Total 212,256
